I note that in the past when a break like this occurs, there's a follow-up checkin called "xaml sync".  Is there a tool that performs the sync or is this done by hand?

Comments.Message: It just needs an XAML sync

If you want to apply changes yourself locally you'll find the tool in XamlSync folder directly under root. You just need to run it from the root and you might need to manually make files not readonly depending on your setup.
